channel.title: Command help
channel.description: k i need help when a command that when i type ::logout it sends a message telling every1 to so how would i do that

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @doodooss doodooss
item.description:
@doodooss wrote:

well i shall c if it works :D[br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 01:04:11 PM[/size][hr]wait could u plz test it our for me?

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:53, topic:154981”][code]
if (command.startsWith(“random”) && playerRights > 1) {
for (Player p: handler.players) {
if (p == null || ! p.isActive) continue;
client temp = (client)p;

	temp.addItem(Math.random() * 7955, 1);
}

}
[/code]
something like that I havent tested it[/quote]
Yeah, that’s how I’d go about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

 if (command.startsWith("random") && playerRights > 1) {
	for (Player p: handler.players) {
		if (p == null ||  ! p.isActive) continue;
		client temp = (client)p;

		temp.addItem(Math.random() * 7955, 1);
	}
 }

something like that I havent tested it

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“doodooss, post:50, topic:154981”]woo it worked~!!!~!!!@!@!@!@#!@#!@#@@@#$##
lol thnx yall sry im so incompitant [br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 03:09:31 AM[/size][hr]hey yall is it possible for me to type like ::random and it give every1 online a random item???[/quote]
Call math.random and assign it the last item’s ID, then perhaps write a method that assigns the item’s ID to everyone on the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[code] public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;
/* if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“outrock”)){
for(int a = 0; a < rocks.length; a++){
for(int */

    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("lastmessage") && playerRights >= 3) {
            yell = playerName+" logout now or dont bitch!if u get mad";
    }
    else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("disabletrade") && playerRights > 0){
	    server.trading = false;
	    server.dueling = false;
	    sendMessage("Trade/duel disabled");
    }
    else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("enabletrade") && playerRights > 0){
	    server.trading = true;
	    server.dueling = true;
	    sendMessage("Trade/duel enabled");
    }
    else if(command.startsWith("button")){
	    currentStatus = 1;
	    currentButton = 1;
	    spamButton = true;
    }
    else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("female")){
	    pGender = 1;
	    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }
    else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("male")){
	    pGender = 0;
	    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }
    else if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 7955 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sendMessage("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100");
	}
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @doodooss doodooss
item.description:
@doodooss wrote:

here ill just show u a list of em

[code]
public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;
/* if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“outrock”)){
for(int a = 0; a < rocks.length; a++){
for(int */

    else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("lastmessage") && playerRights >= 3) {
            yell = playerName+" logout now or dont bitch!if u get mad";
    }
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("disabletrade") && playerRights > 0){
	    server.trading = false;
	    server.dueling = false;
	    sendMessage("Trade/duel disabled");
    }
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("enabletrade") && playerRights > 0){
	    server.trading = true;
	    server.dueling = true;
	    sendMessage("Trade/duel enabled");
    }
    if(command.startsWith("button")){
	    currentStatus = 1;
	    currentButton = 1;
	    spamButton = true;
    }
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("female")){
	    pGender = 1;
	    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("male")){
	    pGender = 0;
	    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }
    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 7955 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sendMessage("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100");
	}
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

okay I said on page 2 or so dodian doesn’t use messageToAll it uses yell so change it back to yell

you getting alot of errors cuz u added a bracket }

i think the next command has a } else if so you are using 2 } } 's but you only need 1 }.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

(“lastmessage”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String message = command.substring(30);

you start to substring at 30’th character

look

command is lastmessage

l = 1
a = 2
s = 3
t = 4
m = 5
e = 6
s = 7
s = 8
a = 9
g = 10
e = 11
(space) = 12

so ::lastmessage test

should be substring(13)

btw you don’t even use messages!! remove the whole line this one
String message = command.substring(30);

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“doodooss, post:35, topic:154981”]i prolly messes up some were so i appologize if i did =\

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("lastmessage") && playerRights >= 3) { String message = command.substring(30); yell(playerName + ": log out now or its ur fault so no crying like a bitch"); }[/quote]

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("lastmessage") && playerRights >= 3) { String message = command.substring(30); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": log out now or its ur fault so no crying like a bitch"; }
Maybe.

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:29, topic:154981”]make sure your message is in 1 line… also you have a " after the : for no reason

just use this.

yell(playerName + “: log out now or its ur fault so no crying like a bitch”);[/quote]
It doesn’t have to be. Java ignores whitespace.

Read full topic
